#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int a,b,c;
	cin>>a>>b>>c;
	//if(a==0)	{  cout<<"AP "<<c+b<<endl; continue;  	}
	//else
	//{
	 while(1)
	  {
	    if(a==0 && b==0 && c==0)return 0;
		if((double)b/a == (double)c/b)
		{
			cout<<"GP "<<c*(c/b)<<endl;
		}
		else cout<<"AP "<<c+(c-b)<<endl;
		cin>>a>>b>>c;
		}
   //}
	return 0;
}
